front.title: •Ruhk
front.gametext: While armed with a blaster, your assassins and leaders here are immune to Blaster Proficiency and Clash Of Sabers and, if Shadow Collective just flipped, may peek at top two cards of your Reserve Deck and take one into hand.

rulings: When Shadow Collective flips, the response on You Know Who I Answer To and the response on Rukh may be performed in either order.
'Immune to Blaster Proficiency' prevents the control phase sniping function and prevents the place in Lost Pile function. It does not prevent 3 being added to weapon destiny.
